headline.main: Yuan May Be Disturbed in Short Term, but Will Follow Fundamentals in Long Run: Central Banker
headline.print_headline: Yuan May Be Disturbed in Short Term, but Will Follow Fundamentals in Long Run: Central Banker

lead_paragraph: The exchange rate for China's yuan currency will be "disturbed" by short term factors but will be determined by fundamentals over the long run, China's deputy central bank governor Pan Gongsheng said on Sunday.
snippet: The exchange rate for China's yuan currency will be "disturbed" by short term factors but will be determined by fundamentals over the long run, China's deputy central bank governor Pan Gongsheng said on Sunday....
